author: Staff Reporter
text:
M. Varun alias Kosumuttai (25) of Asramam in Suchindram was detained under the Goondas Act on Monday.

Many cases were pending against him in Aravoimozhi, Kottar and Suchindram police stations in Kanyakumari district.

Collector Sajjansingh R. Chavan ordered his detention under the Goondas Act as per the recommendations of the Superintendent of Police G. Dharmaraj, police sources here said.
title: Youth detained under Goondas Act
